TopicTitle: Salty Explorer and Salty Stratus Mk. I

Articles.Content:
The Salty Explorer is a long range rocket capable of sending fairly large craft into orbit. I got the idea from a Saturn IV Mockup someone (don't remember who) was trying to build.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WqQqK2DvmfU&feature=related

The Salty Stratus Mk. I is a was developed to a long range bomber. This is a video of it's first flight. I have currently developed the Salty Stratus Mk. II and the Mk. IIa. The Mk. IIa i weaponized.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ygv89KVkEmI&feature=related

I like the Salty Explorer design and Elton John behind it makes it that much better! I like how you timed the music to the first stage breaking off. What mod are these parts from?

Also, I'm impressed at how much control you seem to have over the Salty Stratus Mk. I.

I'd like to play with the Salty Stratus(*) if you feel like uploading the ship file. The wings aren't standard, are they?

(*) And there's a dirty-sounding phrase

Th mods that were used are:

Wobbly Rockets - http://www.multiupload.com/V2CFJ1U4C8

Excelsior Engines - http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=160.0

Long Wings + Gravity Bomb - http://www.jaanus.cc/files/wing+bomb.rar

I'm pretty sure that's all the mods I used, I have a ton more downloaded so I'm not entirely sure.

Here's the download for the Salty Stratus: http://www./?03w96kjo6d0mjzk

Here's the download for the Salty Stratus: http://www./?03w96kjo6d0mjzk

Thanks, Salty!
